description: Discover soothing melodies and vibrant rhythms that capture the essence of luxurious living in Pondicherry's elite villas. Dive in!
title: Pondicherry Elite Villas

places.description: Vibrant rooms with en suite bathrooms & colourful textiles in a homey guesthouse.
places.name: Patricia Guest House

reviews.text: Excellent location. Close to the Promenade, beach and Aurobindo Ashram. The room, we occupied on the second floor, was big with some antique furnitures.  Simon was helpful and quick to address minor issues in the room. Breakfast is not provided. But quite a few restaurants to choose from in White Town.

A beautiful house with a lovely host....The house is very well located...away from the hustle and bustle of the city...yet easily accessible to all places in the French Colony. We took some great walks in the area during our three day stay...

This was my first visit to Puducherry and Simon, our host helped us plan our itinerary. He gave great suggestions on must-visit places and eateries. Though the suggestions were all awesome, we skipped on half the places because the kids never wanted to step out as they loved Simon's house so much.

We got the first floor cottage with sit-out area. The room, the decor, the plants, the mellow music, the chirping sound of birds...it was all amazingly relaxing and in perfect sync with our expectations from a vacation.

Kids were grumpy and sad while leaving the place. They wanted to stay with their Simon uncle forever and ever. We left the place with a heavy heart and a new friend added to our list. Thank you Simon for sharing your house with us....Goodbye...until we meet again!!

Our stay was super comfortable in this beautiful heritage home. The place has a lot of plants and beautiful artwork everywhere. Our room also had a swing which my mom thoroughly enjoyed. Talk to Olivier before booking if your check-in is late. He was kind enough to wait for us when we checked in at 9:00 pm due to heavy rains enroute . Overall it was a nice stay .
An authentic residence in the heart of White Town. A very warm and exceptional welcome. Perfect location, just 100 meters from the Sri Aurobindo Ashram. Ideal for a spiritual retreat.

The gorgeous yellow house is located in White Town and is very accessible. Right from the street view to the interiors, the place is graceful. Plants and trees fill all corners and spaces, it's a treat to look at. Our room was by the verandah and is thoughtfully and aesthetically done. The host Olivier, was very helpful and shared some information on the tourism around and gave us some wonderful recommendations to eat. There's so much art in the house, it's difficult to figure out where to look at! A literal paradise and a very comfortable stay.

places.address: 28, Francois Martin St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Warm quarters with balconies in a relaxed hotel featuring a rooftop restaurant & an outdoor pool.
places.generalDescription: This luxurious resort in Pondicherry features a rooftop restaurant with an outdoor pool and balconies that overlook the ocean. The comfortable rooms come with a range of amenities, including free WiFi. There is also a 24-hour front desk and room service available.
places.name: Villa Du Ocean

reviews.text: Great. Old heritage building with rooms that match the era.. Wooden blackout shutters on windows, four poster bed, but modern bathroom. Breakfast is OK, cold food but edible. Staff friendly, location brilliant for nice evening dining options nearby. Would recommend Superior room with balcony excellent , personally no other room would  suit. Suite is OK but no balcony view.

Stayed here with my wife last weekend and really enjoyed it. The hotel is just a short walk to the main beach, so we could hang out there even late at night. The view from the restaurant overlooking the beach is just amazing. A perfect spot to relax.

The location is excellent, with lots of restaurants and pubs nearby. Definitely a good place to stay if you want to be in the middle of everything. My wife loved the big room and the whole French heritage vibe of the building. Honestly didnâ€™t expect such a spacious room in the busy White Town area. It was a nice surprise. The corridor is a bit narrow, but the size of the room makes up for it.

Service was really good too. The staff were polite and helpful. Shoutout to Chef Arun. He asked us how we wanted our food and customized the Dragon Chicken for us. It turned out super tasty!

Overall, a great place to stay. Would definitely recommend it. Totally worth the money.

The room was not as clean as expected, and unfortunately, the TV and plug points were not functioning, which was inconvenient. The staff could also be more welcoming to enhance the overall guest experience. Given that nearby properties offer better service and amenities at more competitive prices, I would recommend considering other options for a more comfortable stay.

Got the ground floor room besides the store room. It was spacious but damp and moist at the start. There was a smell which you get in places always closed and have 0 ventilation. No window facing outwards.

Beautiful Heritage Design, But Needs Deep Cleaning!

I stayed at this hotel for two days, and while the view was nice and the location in the city was convenient, the cleanliness was a major letdown. The staff was helpful, and the food was okay, but the hotel desperately needs deep cleaning.

The rooms had a beautiful heritage design, which added charm, but that was overshadowed by the lack of cleanliness. There were insects, spider webs, and dust everywhere, making the stay uncomfortable. Itâ€™s a shame because this place has so much potential.

If they focus on improving cleanliness, this could be a fantastic stay. But until then, I wouldnâ€™t recommend it to those who value hygiene.

places.address: No. 14, Rue, Romain Rolland St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Large residential spiritual community with meditation & yoga practice, open to day visitors.
places.generalDescription: Sri Aurobindo Ashram is a serene and expansive spiritual community that welcomes day visitors to partake in meditation and yoga practices. The ashram's lush green gardens and tranquil pathways create a peaceful atmosphere, making it an ideal setting for couples to immerse themselves in its calming ambiance. The colonial-style architecture and vibrant flora add to the visual appeal, providing a picturesque backdrop for activities such as pre-wedding photoshoots.
places.name: Sri Aurobindo Ashram

reviews.text: I wasnâ€™t sure what to expect when I visited the Sri Aurobindo Ashram, but I was pleasantly surprised. Itâ€™s not your typical tourist spot itâ€™s quiet, no photography allowed, and very respectful. I learned a lot about Sri Aurobindo and The Mother. The bookshop nearby has some great spiritual and philosophical reads. Definitely worth stopping by if youâ€™re curious about Indian spirituality or just want a break from the beach crowd.

Good to visit to see the Samadhi and come out in a few minutes. As seen in other reviews, the staff is very rude. There is a bookstore towards the exit. I switched on my phone to pay for the books, and picked a call which was urgent of my family, the staff gave me a lecture that had the management seen they would have taken my phone for 2 hours.

What kind of kiddish behaviour is this? How do we pay for the books if not cash.

We went to meditate in the ashram in the morning ðŸŒ… on Sunday. Lots of people come and go. Nowadays the weather is a bit hot and there are lots of trees surrounded by nice air.
The sea is also near if anybody wants them to go immediately. If anybody wants to eat breakfast ðŸ¥ž lunch or dinner they have to make tickets. mobiles are kept silent ðŸ”• and sleeper are kept in front of the ashram.

Very calm, peaceful place. Phones are not allowed to be switched on inside. People come here to meditate as even the guides don't speak in there. Very peaceful place. You need to remove your shoes before going in. There is a shoe stand right opposite the entrance where you can keep your shoes at free of cost.

It's an Auro based Ashram as the name tells, No photography allowed.. You need to switch off mobile and show it to the gate keepers.. It have the memory place of Sri Aurobindo Ghosh. New globe structure ashram is far away from this place.. This is the primary ashram which build by Sri. Aurobindo Ghosh..he was an indian yogi, mahirshi and poet.The Sri Aurobindo Ashram (French: Ashram de Sri Aurobindo) is a spiritual community (ashram) located in Pondicherry, in the Indian territory of Puducherry.The Sri Aurobindo Ashram Trust was established in 1955 to administer the community and its assets.

places.address: and, No. 9, Marine Street, White Town, Puducherry, 605002, India

places.generalDescription: The FIJI Villa is a luxury villa that offers stunning views of the ocean and lush gardens. It has an extensive range of facilities, including a pool, private beach, and several restaurants and bars. The villa is situated on a secluded island, making it perfect for privacy and relaxation. The FIJI Villa is a luxurious villa with stunning views of the ocean located on a secluded island.
places.name: FIJI Villa

reviews.text:
WORST STAY EVER!!!
We booked for one night (17/5/2025) stay for 8 members for 5k including a family with 7 month baby.  Before booking itself i informed that we have baby so we need kitchen . They said everything is available u can come like that.
After reaching the place we seen
1.Lot of insects in the kitchen even in bedroom and u can see minimum of 15 cockroaches flying here and there.
2. Kitchen utensils are not cleaned. Previously used persons left as it is and these people giving the same without cleaning.
3. Only induction stove . Not suitable for cooking. Also only 3 vessels for cooking with broken wooden vessel
4. 1st floor washroom door cannot be closed. It won't lock properly.  If we ask They said it was like that only u can use it .
5. They said terrace not allowed as in neighbor building one family is staying.  Later asking They opened it.
6. Also They said there will be power cut usually in that area for 2 hours. So we can't use ac , induction when there is no power.
7. They will provide fresh water in a can only if we ask otherwise u have to use the old can or the ro with insects inside.

Don't trust the images uploaded in map and booking.com and other sites..

Lots and lots of rules.. They should focus on maintenance.

One positive is caretaker is good and when u ask things he tries to make them clear but the thing is that's not enough.

For the money we are paying we can't get back even 20% of it. Suitable for bachelors but that too I don't know at what extent.

It ruined our stay experience . Totally Worst...

"Our recent stay was an absolute disaster! We booked a place for 8 members, including a family with a 7-month-old baby, for â‚¹5,000 per night. Despite informing the management about our baby's needs, we were disappointed to find:

- A kitchen infested with insects and cockroaches
- Dirty utensils and broken cooking equipment
- A washroom door that wouldn't lock properly
- Inconsistent rules about terrace access
- Frequent power cuts that made it hard to use essential appliances
- Poor water supply with insects in the RO system

The place needs serious maintenance and upkeep. While the caretaker was helpful, it wasn't enough to salvage our stay. For the price, we expected much better. Avoid this place unless you're a bachelor looking for a no-frills stay. Trust us, you won't get value for your money."

The rooms are good but you can't close the bathroom door is 1st floor bedroom......Good for family and friends to stay.....flow of water in bathrooms are slow.....over all the place is good...near to centre just like 3 kms and affordable price
A veryy nice and decent villa to chill with friends, especially FAZIL bro is very chill and co operative, nxt time in pondi with frnds come here!
Clean and perfect, many hotels available nearby, Extra beds will be provided for free, best place to stay for a group or a family who are looking for a low budget trip ðŸ’¯ðŸ’¯

places.address: 4th Cross St, Amirtha Garden Jamyeth Nagar, Kottakuppam, Puducherry, 605104, India

places.description: Down-to-earth rooms, some with balconies, in a relaxed hotel offering a terrace.
places.name: The French Villa

reviews.text:
The Seaview room which we stayed offered a spacious balcony with a breathtaking sunrise views. Rooms alloted on given time.
Affordable price.
Bike rentals available.
No service except at the time of entry as no intercoms available.
No lift and hence elderly to avoid.
Could have been better with a small dressing table and a bedroom mirror.
The A/C stopped working in the middle of the night.
Still the location is prime and the with magnificent views deserves a 4 star rating.

I loved this place very much. This place had everything we expected. If I explain more then we get hot water all the time, hot drinking water,24*7 service from reception in Total I was very satisfied.

Authentic french villa in heart of white town, with all tourist location at walkable distance surrounded by amazing restaurants with amazing host Alex, we booked their sea view room for one day, later the host offered us good deal for our remaining trip.... The host also guided us visit places in pondicherry along with restaurants and special food serving their, we were guided with exact location and time  for sunrise.... truly recommended.... safe for women and solo travellers..... we will be booking same place whenever we visit again to pondicherry

Lovely 198 years old property and wonderful host Alex.
Looking forward to visiting again soon.

Worst ever room in my life.I recently stayed at this hotel and was thoroughly disappointed. The cleanliness was far below acceptable standards; the room had a musty smell and visible dirt in several areas. To make matters worse, basic toiletries like dental kit were not provided, which is a basic expectation for any hotel. For the price it's too high they are looting us in the name of heritage properties. I cannot recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a decent stay. Save your money and look elsewhere will get better option in half the price.

places.address: 51, Suffren St, Opposite Alliance, White Town, FranÃ§aise, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.name: Chan Maison @ Lakshmi Garden

reviews.text:
It was really a nice stay, homely stay with all five star hotel amenities, peaceful stay amidst garden, really worth every penny, host and care taker, took care of us very well.

They allowed us for early check-in at 5:30 AM and they were kind enough to pick our calls at early morning.

Very friendly and helpful staff, property is off-highway, at an average distance of 5km from city center,  various temples, beaches, Aurobindo ashram.
Property has nicely maintained mini garden, lawn, nice trees like mango,lemon,almond and so on. Has got a facility of barbecue. All in all a very nice experience

My most memorable holiday. Chan Maison made it worthwhile. It is a perfect place for relaxation and is well connected with all the popular places. Auroville is just 15- 20minutes from the villa.

Only issue that can be addressed are the mosquitoes making it difficult to venture outdoors or sit in the garden or even to keep the doors open for fresh air.
Very affordable for the stay.  Definitely worth to stay! We made BBQs they had BBQ maker. We even cooked food of our own. We created beautiful memories here
The place is a heaven for a small outing...but if ur looking for some party scene & pubbing....this place is little far (12-15 mins) from the beach side.

places.address: Lawspet, Puducherry, Tamil Nadu 605101, India

places.description: Modern rooms in an upscale pick, offering elegant buffet dining, an outdoor pool & a refined bar.
places.generalDescription: Accord Puducherry is a contemporary hotel located in a central area, offering modern rooms with amenities such as LCD TVs, personal safes, minibars, and bathtubs. The hotel prides itself on being pet-friendly and welcomes furry companions as an integral part of the guest experience.
places.name: Accord Puducherry

reviews.text:
We had a pleasant stay there. The rooms were comfortable, the service was excellent, and the food was superb.
A special mention for the kidsâ€™ room, it was a thoughtful addition that we really appreciated.

And Special shoutout to Muruga and the Valet staff as well! They were good

Areas for Improvement:
1. Swimming Pool: Although I donâ€™t swim, I did notice that the pool didnâ€™t appear very clean, which didnâ€™t align with the otherwise good standards maintained across the property.

2. Room Key Issues: We faced issues with the room key automatically deactivating, requiring us to return to the reception to reactivate it. This was quite inconvenient.

3. Dining Area: While the food was excellent, the table setup in the dining area could use more attention. On multiple occasions, tables were allotted without napkins or tissue paper. We experienced this ourselves and also heard similar feedback from another family. Itâ€™s a small detail, but improving it would make the dining experience even better.

The Accord Puducherry seasons restaurant buffet offers it's patrons a fantastic overall experience. The spread is well curated both for the Vegetarian and Carnivorous lovers, it's not huge as in some places but it's more than adequate and more importantly everything on offer is excellent. We went there twice, the Sunday brunch buffet, which was brilliant and for a weekday dinner, which was equally satisfying. The staff are very attentive to your needs and work really hard to ensure you have a relaxing dining experience. The only downside is you will in take in more calories than your daily needs - I suppose one should know that before stepping up to any sumptuous buffet. Had a relaxing and enjoyable meal on both occasions - hope to return when in Puducherry next.

The service and hotel staff are extremely courteous, efficient and friendly. Even as we had an issue with the bathrooms (shower and sink issues), it was immediately rectified. We were also upgraded and we had a wonderful time. It would be great if the service time (restaurant and in-room) dining was equally quick.

We stayed for 3 days here.

In the room: the in room dining was a good experience, the portions were huge, and food was tasty.

The cups in the room had stains though. We enjoyed the pool though, it was a good size and clean.

Breakfast buffet: not a big spread but itâ€™s alright. I had issues with their tea station and raised this concern with the chef. They provided me a good tea on the last day. Food was alright.

This is a good hotel for sure.

Pros and cons ( you decide to go or not ) :

=====
PROS:
=====
Very friendly reception staff
Welcome drink
Vallet or self parking both are available
Kids play area in M floor is super cool.
Season restaurant in ground floor lunch and breakfast buffet is too good. Season staff are super friendly. Great chef. Super awesome food.
Room is nice and decent.
Decent location (near four cross junction)

=====
CONS:
=====
If you need swimming pool this is not the place as the pool is shared with public (non residents) its too crowded always. As they run swimming classes for non residents.
Also pool size is small and too much crowd.
I came twice for swimming but had to go back as more crowd.

Overall
This is perfect stay for business folks.
And family with kids.
But if you need swimming pool no from me as the pool is shared with non residents.

places.address: 1, Thilagar Nagar, Ellaipillaichavady, Aruthra Nagar, Puducherry, 605009, India

places.description: Down-to-earth guesthouse close to the beach offering an outdoor pool & a garden.
places.generalDescription: Kadal The Beach House is a charming boutique villa nestled in Kottakuppam Serenity Beach, just a stone's throw from Pondicherry. This delightful guesthouse combines traditional architecture with modern furnishings, creating an inviting atmosphere for guests. With spacious rooms that can accommodate up to ten people, it's perfect for families or groups looking to unwind together. The property features a lovely outdoor pool and a serene garden where you can relax and soak up the sun.
places.name: KADAL THE BEACH HOUSE

reviews.text: the place is reside in the nice environment the Kadal resort was really beautiful the inside house was really we'll constructed lighter and the spaces very nice for the kids. and I love the room and the swimming pool as well as the kitchen the service was really done well by the people over there. I surely recommend this place for happy and peaceful weekend.

We had an amazing retreat at Kadal The beach house. The staff took great care of us. They were super helpful and friendly. It was located superbly close to everything and the pool was gorgeous. For a large group having spacious rooms and en-suite bathroom for each room was a luxury. They had laundry service and a dishwasher and a beautiful kitchen equipped with all amenities. Very kid friendly and had a spread of fresh and yummy south Indian food every morning. Highly recommend this place especially for a large family gathering or office retreat but also ideal for solo travellers or couples since the rooms are thoughtfully designed. Thank you to all the staff at Kadal -le Marc and team!!

Recently stayed at Kadal The Beach House. We had booked the entire property for our 2 night stay. This is located pretty close to the Serenity beach and has easy access from the main road. The property is very nicely made, with careful selection of furniture and decor. It has a nice swimming pool to relax. The kids had a great time in the pool and was definitely the saving grace, given the weather in Pondicherry now. The rooms are very well appointed with large spaces and beds good enough to accommodate 3 adults. Couple of rooms had an open bathroom, which gave a real feeling of being at a villa in Bali. The caretaker Krishna was always available and ensured our stay was peaceful. The villa has large sit out spaces tastefully furnished with beautiful furniture and decor. We had a great stay. Breakfast served was nice with good options, but would have preferred hot and freshly made at the villa. Overall an A+ villa that becomes A++ if you book the entire space.

Kadal the beach house is Nearer to Serenity beach . A bit far from white town. Compact and calm place . The staffs are polite and friendly. Rooms are clean but not at its best. They have arranged Car parking exactly opposite to their building(Empty Plot).

Decent staying place.

Perfect place to have a private party. The pool is beautiful and has a deep end too. Three big rooms perfect for a group of about 10 but you can rent individual rooms too. Breakfast spread is really good. Fridge is loaded with goodies and there is a fully equipped kitchen with masalas and oil. Cutlery is of premium quality. If informed in advance they'll arrange for a BBQ too. Parking is on the road and pretty narrow. Noise proofing is bad. Beware of the mosquitoes.

places.address: 33, Old Chennai road, Serenity Beach Rd, Kottakuppam, Puducherry, Tamil Nadu 605014, India

places.description: Coastal stretch with a seawall & a palm tree-lined promenade, popular for watching the sunrise.
places.generalDescription: Rock Beach, also known as Pondicherry Beach, Promenade Beach, and Mahatma Gandhi Beach, is a unique coastal stretch in Pondicherry. It features a seawall and a palm tree-lined promenade that makes it popular for watching the sunrise. The 1.5 km long coastline starts at the War Memorial and ends at Dupleix Park on Goubert Avenue.
places.name: Rock Beach

reviews.text: Nice beach area, mostly clean on the pavements . But beach area is bit dirty. Must visit during the sunrise and after sunset. Characterized by sea breeze and boulevard of trees and lined up by old french architectures. The local authority should ensure and apply strong measures to maintain cleanliness of this pristine location.

Visited Rock Beach at Pondyâ€™s Promenade â€” itâ€™s a beautiful spot, especially in the morning and evening. The breeze is strong, the vibe is peaceful, and itâ€™s perfect for a calm walk or just sitting by the sea. But Iâ€™d avoid going during the daytime â€” it gets extremely hot, the sun is harsh, and my skin felt dry and irritated. I even ended up feeling unwell. So definitely plan your visit around sunrise or sunset â€” itâ€™s totally worth it then!

Rock Beach is simply a gem! The moment you step onto the promenade, youâ€™re greeted by the soothing sound of waves crashing on the rocks and the refreshing sea breeze. The entire stretch is super clean, well-maintained, and perfect for long, peaceful walks. Sunrise here is absolutely magical â€” a must-experience for every visitor.

A peaceful and scenic spot in the heart of Pondicherry!
Rock Beach is the perfect place for an early morning walk or a relaxing evening with cool sea breeze and wave sounds. Beautiful view of the Bay of Bengal, clean promenade, iconic Gandhi statue, and plenty of cafÃ©s nearby. Loved the atmosphere, street food, and the sunset! A must-visit if you're in Pondy!

It's a beautiful place. Visiting time morning or Evening is better. Can enjoy with families, friends or couples. We can see beautiful sunset and sunrise. Almost every facility is available near. Food price is little bit high because of tourism.

places.address: 23, Laporte St, MG Road Area, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Warm accommodations in a casual hotel featuring a simple rooftop eatery & a garden with a koi pond.
places.generalDescription: Nestled in the heart of Pondicherry, Villa Ecotiva offers a warm and inviting atmosphere that feels like a home away from home. This charming hotel features uniquely designed accommodations adorned with antique furniture, ensuring each room has its own character. Guests can choose from various options, some equipped with private kitchens and luxurious jacuzzis for ultimate relaxation. The lush garden is a serene escape, complete with a tranquil koi pond that adds to the peaceful ambiance.
places.name: Villa Ecotiva

reviews.text:
Perfect Getaway!

We had a truly wonderful experience at Villa Ecotiva during our stay!

The Deluxe Double Room with Jacuzzi felt like a slice of heaven. The room was spotless and well-maintained. After a long day, unwinding in the Jacuzzi was the highlight of our stay. They thoughtfully provided complimentary bottled water, instant coffee, tea, and a kettle â€” small touches that made a big difference.

The bed was super fluffy and comfortable, and fresh towels and quality toiletries were provided. The service was top-notch â€” prompt, polite, and professional.

We also enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, which was both delicious and satisfying. On top of that, the villa features a beautiful swimming pool, and fun indoor games like snooker and darts, adding to the relaxing vibe.

Would definitely recommend Villa Ecotiva to anyone looking for a peaceful and cozy getaway!

This was my second time staying at Villa Ecotiva, and once again, everything was perfect! The ambiance is peaceful, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. It truly feels like a hidden gem for a relaxing getaway. Highly recommend for anyone looking to unwind in a serene setting. Looking forward to coming back again!

We had a wonderful stay at this villa! The property was spotless, beautifully decorated, and equipped with everything we needed for a relaxing vacation. The outdoor space was the highlight â€” plenty of seating, and amazing views that made every sunset unforgettable. The host was responsive, friendly, and gave us great local recommendations. Weâ€™ll definitely be coming back and highly recommend this villa to anyone looking for a peaceful, luxurious retreat.

Avoid the place. Bad service, stale breakfast, bad cleanliness, rude staff.

Payed almost 7000/- for a jacuzzi room.
Jacuzzi was poorly managed and dirty. The location of the property is isolated, not much nearby. Telephone in the room doesn't work to call the hotel reception.

The view from the room was a dirty swamp of trash, from the first floor itself.

Hotel reception doesn't even have a first aid kit, when my friend had a cut. Not even basic Dettol, cotton, bandaids etc. They went and got it.
We had a friend visiting in the morning, around 9am, less than two hours from our checkout.

The reception staff started harrassing us during breakfast saying how can someone come like this, why didn't you inform us, what are you doing, why is your friend here etc. horrible hospitality. My friend came in from the entrance, no one was at the reception, and they started The drama. The bald man from reception could not speak politely at all since our friend came.

I ordered roasted bread, it came out hard and almost burnt. My friend ordered poori, it came out like a papad. Idli was very thick to bite, and chewy.

Waste of money, and service.

Our experience staying at Hotel Villa Ecotiva was excellent. We were completely satisfied with the service. Mr.Madhan's service was very helpful, polite, and took great care of us. Breakfast was also well served and enjoyable.

places.address: 33, Meyar Rathinavelu Pillai Nagar, Kottakuppam, Puducherry, 605104, India

places.description: Individually decorated quarters with antique furniture in a storied hotel with a restaurant & a bar.
places.generalDescription: Located in the heart of Pondicherry's historic White Town, Le Dupleix is a charming hotel set in an 18th-century home. The individually decorated rooms feature antique furniture, adding to the elegance and sophistication of the place. The hotel also boasts a restaurant with a fusion menu that combines French and Indian elements, offering dishes like Poricha Kozhi and Tawa Fried Fish. The breezy courtyard restaurant adds to the palatial feel of this French bungalow-turned-hotel.
places.name: Le Dupleix

reviews.text:
An absolute gem in the heart of White Town, Le Dupleix is pure magic! My stay was nothing short of dreamlike. Tucked away in the charming lanes of White Town, this stunning property radiates aesthetic elegance. From the beautifully designed rooms to the calming ambience that instantly makes you feel at home.

But what truly sets this place apart is the incredible warmth of the staff. A special shoutout to Jemima, who was an angel! Not only did she ensure my early check-in went smoothly, but she also checked in on me multiple times during my stay with such genuine warmth.

The lovely Padmini from housekeeping was sweeter than honey. Courteous, thoughtful, and always smiling. And I canâ€™t forget Suneel and Saravanan, who not only kept my room spotless but even left behind the cutest handwritten note, thanking me for choosing Le Dupleix. I mean, who does that?

If youâ€™re heading to Pondy and want an experience thatâ€™s more than just a stay, something that truly touches your heart, Le Dupleix is the place to be. Canâ€™t recommend it enough.

We were doing cafe/bar hopping and came across to this fantastic place! They have Absolutely unique items on the Menu for both Veg and Non Veg section. Though outdoor section was having great seating arrangement we Preferred to seat Indoor as it was a very hot  afternoon in the Month of May.  Service was on point. We also checked the Rooms and We totally fell in love with it's vintage vibes.
Loved the stay and food here. The live music in evenings is awesome! Gulnaj assisted us during our stay with the food and all. Always with a big smile on her face which feels very welcoming.

Hereâ€™s a refined version of your restaurant review:We visited for a fine dining experience and tried the lobster tortellini, which was quite good. The cocktails were up to standard and well-crafted. The ambiance was beautiful, with a charming touch of French historical influence that added to the overall experience.

Beautiful stay. Good food. And great service. Thats what made our stay at Le Dupleix a really relaxed one. Pappu Pal took real good care of us - setting the standards for great hospitality. The prawn alio olio was the best i had in years. Here's looking to come back again.

places.address: 5, Casern St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.generalDescription: Coloniale Heritage is a charming guest house with a rustic and colorful ambiance, offering an old-world charm. The rooms provide great views and are elegantly decorated with carefully hand-picked furniture. Located in the heart of Pondicherry's bazaar, this oriental-inspired guesthouse is housed in a revamped merchant house behind striking red doors. Guests praise the delightful charm and old-school feel of the place, as well as the sweet staff who offer refreshing Nannari juice.
places.name: Coloniale Heritage

reviews.text:
We loved our stay at Coloniale Heritage. The location is brilliant for getting to very good restaurants and itâ€™s situated in a smart road in town. The room was very spacious and thoughtfully decorated and furnished. The bed was very comfortable and we had our own little veranda where we could have had breakfast had we wished. Powerful warm shower and efficient ac and fans. Breakfast was very fresh each day and consisted of croissants, du pain and eggs.
Very nice to chat to the friendly owners who were full of advice about the area. They also did our small bag of laundry free of charge which I thought was very generous. Highly recommend a stay here.

We had a wonderful stay! The staff was incredibly kind and attentive, always welcoming and friendly. If anyone has doubts about whether they should stay here, I can confidently say â€“ you should! Highly recommended!

Sabine is an excellent host. She has very  clean rooms which are renovated from an old traditional Pondicherry house . The beautiful garden outside and the small french touch she adds to this B&B is really beautiful. A great positively vibe in there !
Moreover , this place is in a perfect location .

We've just had a wonderful stay in the most aesthetic ambience of a French Home right in the French Colony.  Very clean, greenery right from the first step that to take into the place, relaxing atmosphere with plenty of space to lounge around unlike a hotel room.  Tourist from all around Puducherry visit this particular area to take photographs as it's amazingly colourful and flowers all around.  Just to get in every time that we came back to the House we had to stand for a few minutes that people were clicking pictures in this beautiful artistic entrance way. Ms Sabine is a wonderful person as also her entire help that she has with her.  Thank you to all for making it a memorable stay for us :-)

If there were 7 stars on Google, I would have given it.
For my selfish reasons, I hope this stay remains underrated and people don't find out about it.
Everything about this place is delightfully charming and old school at the same time.
Sabine and the Akkas working here are very sweet and always gave us Nannari juice when we came from the heat. The rooms are  whimsically made and the balcony in each room is the cherry on top.

Every time I come back to Pondicherry, Coloniale Heritage is my go to place.

Pro Tip - The scooty rates here are the lowest, don't go outside searching for it. We made a mistake.

places.address: 54, Romain Rolland St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Modern hotel offering 2 restaurants, plus a terrace, an outdoor pool & bay views.
places.generalDescription: This posh, boutique hotel offers guests sweeping views of the promenade beach and a wealth of amenities perfect for a relaxing day. From the chic interiors to the outdoor pool and terrace, The Promenade has everything you need to take advantage of your stay in Kovalam. The staff is friendly and competent but limited in English, which can cause some confusion during transactions.
places.name: The Promenade

reviews.text: The Promenade Hotel was an incredible experience, and we had a great time. The location is to die for, as there is a street right outside the hotel beside the rock beach with shops and markets all around. Everything is within walking distance - the Ashram, Museum, Casa Blanca. The location of the hotel beats any other. Alongside that, the food is exquisite. For anyone who loves desserts, the macaronis are to die for. The spaghetti with meatballs and the rice with steamed egg curry are some of our other favorites. The food is very well-made, and well-served. Additionally, there are multiple other experiences within the hotel itself like Ladies Night, the Rooftop Cafe and so on all of which were incredibly fun experiences. Finally, the staff on duty were nice, kind and very friendly. I would highly recommend speaking to Humaira, if you are staying in The Promenade Hotel. She was accommodating and compromising, like helping freeze some of our food or even getting certain dishes ready even after the restaurant closed. She is also incredibly friendly, and we had a great time conversing with her. Alongside her, the rest of the staff were also very sweet and made the experience that much more special.

Exceptional Experience â€” Thanks to Maria!

Our stay was absolutely wonderful! The hotel ambience was elegant, the service top-class, and the foodâ€”simply delicious! Every dish we tried was rich in flavor and beautifully presented.

A special shoutout to Maria, who served us with such warmth and grace. Her attentiveness, friendly smile, and professionalism truly made our dining experience unforgettable. Sheâ€™s a gem!

Thank you for making our time here so special. Looking forward to visiting again soon!

fantastic experience. The location is unbeatableâ€”right along the seaside, with vibrant and lively surroundings in the evening that truly bring Pondicherry to life. The staff were incredibly friendly, professional, and always ready to help, from the reception to housekeeping, the bar, and the restaurant.

The breakfast was excellent with a wide variety of delicious options. I also loved the pool areaâ€”itâ€™s a perfect spot to relax after a day of exploring. The entire hotel was clean and well-maintained, adding to the comfort of the stay.

Highly recommend for anyone visiting Pondicherry!

Room felt a little small for that price. Great complementary breakfast, but service is rather slow. Terrific filter coffee.  Parking - none on-premises, but they help. Excellent location overlooking the beach - wish they gave us a beach facing room

Had a wonderful stay at Hotel Promenade! The location is absolutely perfectâ€”right by the beach with a stunning view and within walking distance of many attractions. The staff was incredibly warm, courteous, and always ready to help with a smile. Rooms were spacious, clean, and beautifully maintained. The food at the in-house restaurant was delicious, especially the breakfast buffet with plenty of variety. The rooftop pool and bar added a relaxing touch to the overall experience. Highly recommended for anyone visiting the area and looking for a blend of comfort, elegance, and great service!

places.address: 23, Goubert Ave, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.generalDescription: Vasantham Villas is a beautiful place to stay and dine with all the amenities you could ask for. The restaurant has amazing food that will leave you wanting more.
places.name: Vasantham Villas

reviews.text:
The place is clean and well maintained. Feels like you never miss your home. Just a couple of meters walking you will find the serenity beach. The villa is located just before the city starts, so you will never be in a rush and free from traffic. Every spot is easily accessible from this location.

Must try if you are considering going for a trip in pondy.

We stayed in Vasantham Villa on our enroute to Chennai from Mayavaram. Its strategically located near ECR.  House is very spacious and clean.  They had provided soaps, towels shampoos.. it was completely a pleasant stay for us.  We checked out the next day morning.  Owners are very nice people.

Only one issue I faced.  There is a servant maid in the next block, who I think should be doing the cleaning work in this home stay.  She said that we had to pay Rs.300 as cleaning charges and it was House and Owner's rules.  Beware of this lady! She actually lied to us.  We paid the 300 to her.  Without consulting the owner  please do not pay anything to this lady under the pretext of Cleaning Charges.

She did not do any cleaning when we were there,   for the cleaning she intended to do after we leave, she has taken this money that too after lying to us that it is the House Owner's rule.  Please be careful.   If you intend to donate as tips, then it's a different story but demanding as cleaning charges is not good.

Otherwise, it was a pleasant stay..  we recommend staying here.

Its a SCAM.

I booked this stay through Agoda for 1 night (Aug 17-18).
When I reached the location and entered the property, nobody was there and the house was locked. After several times of ringing they finally attended my call and said that my booking was cancelled and they already informed Agoda.
But I never got any information from Agoda and looks like they (Agoda) too didn't get any update from the property owner about cancelling.

Finally Agoda customer care reps told me that they would enquire the property owner and process for the refund.

We stayed for a couple of days in this long weekend here, must say the rooms and ambience was way over the mark than I expected. Everyone in the group also enjoyed and I got special credits for choosing this one. So yeah, kudos to the team and everyone taking care of the place. The owner was also very helpful in smallest of instances and I feel that really should be admired. The villa has a family-house like ambience (you'll find all the things required to stay peacefully as if you're in your own vacation home.), which was something evryone was looking for. Will definitely recommend other to try it out. However the place is at an average distance of 5-15km from most of the tourist places, but considering the geography of Pondicherry of a small scale, it didn't really matter to us since we had our own vehicle.

It's a really cool villa if we go with friends or family. It is super clean and neatly maintained. So many amenities are there like fridge, washing machine,stove and there are 2 AC's in 2 bed rooms and extra cots. Washrooms are very hygienic. Owner and staff is also very friendly. I definitely recommend this if you want to have some cool place to chill and enjoy the vacation.

places.address: No 21, Sudhakar Beach Nagar, Kottakuppam, Puducherry, Tamil Nadu 605104, India

places.description: Cozy rooms in a quaint Colonial-style guesthouse near the beach, plus free breakfast.
places.generalDescription: Les Hibiscus is a charming colonial-style guest house located in the busy White Town district of Trinidad. Offering comfortable, homely accommodation, this B&B has been highly recommended by travellers for its unique atmosphere and proximity to some of the best sights in the area. The breakfast is included in the price, so you can start your day off right.
places.name: Les Hibiscus

reviews.text:
The owner was kind enough to let us check out late because off season.
We'were able to relax until the train time and very comfortable.
We'll definitely come back again. Thank you so much.

Had an excellent stay in Les Hibiscus. The guest house in located in White Town, within walking distance of all the popular cafes and restaurants.
The guest house is a heritage building and is decorated with vintage furniture, pictures and other decorative items.

The room was very spacious.
Breakfast was very generous with fruits, juice, curd, breads, croissants, omelette and coffee.

The owner, Mr Bascarane, was very gracious and we had a nice time chatting with him.

Amazing and cozy place (the room on the roof was just perfect to me), kind staff and delicious breakfast.
Strongly recommend it for a lovely stay in Pondicherry

We had the best time at this lovely hotel in the French quarter of Pondicherry.
The rooms were large, clean and beautifully  decorated. The breakfasts were very substantial and beautifully presented by two lovely ladies.
I canâ€™t speak more highly of the owner, Bascarane, who went the extra mile helping us find our way around India and arranging things for us locally. Highly recommended in every way. You will not be disappointed.

Les Hibiscus is our top choice whenever we visit Pondicherry ! The staff is welcoming, and the rooms are comfortable, making us feel truly at home. Every morning, they serve a delicious, fresh, homemade breakfast thatâ€™s hard to beat. Itâ€™s an authentic place that doesnâ€™t feel like just another hotel â€“ 100% recommended for anyone seeking a genuine stay in Pondicherry!

places.address: 49, Suffren St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Down-to-earth pick offering bright rooms & suites, plus a bar/cafe & a restaurant with a patio.
places.generalDescription: Villa Shanti Hotel & Restaurant is a down-to-earth choice with bright rooms and suites, featuring a bar/cafe and a restaurant with a patio. The ambiance is nice, offering a rooftop view of the beach. Guests have enjoyed having dinner with a beach view and cool breeze. While cocktails were reasonably priced, some found the wine to be expensive. The food was praised for its amazing taste and good quality, although portion sizes were considered moderate.
places.name: Villa Shanti Hotel & Restaurant

reviews.text: Had dinner here on weekday and it was packed.  Tried a couple of items both French and Indian. Not quite sure about the French or international menu but the Indian food was definitely better. Ordered crepe suzette, which was flambeed at the table, which made for a good spectacle. The place is expensive for the portion size and taste of food.

Overhyped and Overpriced â€“ A Truly Disappointing Experience

We had a very underwhelming experience at this restaurant, which unfortunately did not live up to its highly-rated reviews â€” and frankly, we now suspect those glowing reviews might be bought or manipulated.

To start with, there was no air conditioning despite the extreme heat, making the entire dining experience physically uncomfortable. Even after repeated requests, we were not provided cold water, which felt like basic hospitality missing.

The food did not redeem the situation. The chicken was undercooked, making it extremely chewy and unpleasant to eat. The Tagliatelle was also undercooked and lacked proper seasoning or texture. On top of that, the dishes were quite expensive, which only added to the disappointment considering the poor quality.

Service was frustratingly slow. When we requested to cancel some additional dishes just two minutes after ordering â€” due to the situation â€” the staff told us they had already begun preparation and could not cancel. Ironically, those dishes still took ages to arrive and had to be packed as we were no longer in the mood to sit and eat.

All in all, this place was a letdown on every front â€” food, service, comfort, and value for money. Definitely not worth the hype or the price. Would not recommend.

This place lives up to the hype and expectations! The food is just awesome and very tasty. They present it well too.

Service is awesome and fast. Our orders were served pretty quickly too.

The ambience is very good and classy.

Special mention to Masee for doing an amazing job taking care of our large group of 13 people! He will excellent!

My wife and I had such a fun date night here.
The food was very satisfying and Ram took good care of us when we dined. He recommended items based on our preferences and also took pretty pictures of us. The outdoor ambience was so fresh and beautiful.

We recently visited Villa Shanti for a meal, and the experience was absolutely wonderful!
The food was exceptional â€” fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Every dish we tried exceeded our expectations.

The service was equally impressive. Special thanks to Dharni Dharan for his outstanding hospitality and attention to detail. Rana was kind enough to capture a lovely photo of our group, making the moment even more memorable. Fouziya and Prabhas were also extremely warm and helpful, adding to the overall pleasant experience.

Villa Shanti truly offers a perfect blend of amazing food and heartfelt service. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Pondicherry!

places.address: 14, Suffren St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Bright rooms in a sophisticated hotel featuring a rooftop restaurant, an outdoor pool & a spa.
places.generalDescription: Palais de Mahe - CGH Earth is a sophisticated hotel located in the French Quarter of Pondicherry. The boutique hotel features three floors of stylish suites with contemporary furniture and luxury amenities, all housed within a French colonial-style building. Guests can enjoy the rooftop restaurant, outdoor pool, spa services, and Ayurvedic massage center. The hotel's majestic courtyard, deep verandas, attractive pillars and period furniture combine South Indian flavor with French fervor for an unforgettable experience.
places.name: Palais de Mahe - CGH Earth

reviews.text:
Palais de Mahe is an amazing place to stay in Puducherry. During our 3 day stay, the hospitality of the hotel staff, from the reception to the housekeeping, was unparalleled. It was such an inviting environment and the pool was so refreshing that we had to push ourselves to leave the hotel to sightsee! The location is minutes away from the promenade overlooking the beach, with easy access to dining and shops that line the stretch.

The hotel restaurant Les Alizes is truly remarkable - incredibly tasty dishes plated artistically and served with a smile by the able restaurant staff. Nithya, Johnson, Joseph and Mukundan took such good care of our 8 person group, elevating our dining experience with their warmth and prompt service. In addition to the excellent lunch and dinner, the breakfast offering is outstanding, offering a diverse selection that made our group, ranging from 79 years to 15 years super happy every morning!

Very impressed with Palais de Mahe, Les Alizes and the CGH Earth experience. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a place to stay when visiting Puducherry.

A 10/10 experience across the board! The location is 3 min walk from the beach, right in the old French quarter. Loads of delicious dining and drink options around, everything is easily walkable.

The rooms are breezy and large, with very high ceilings. The beds are incredibly comfortable and the rooms are well serviced.

Reception is incredibly helpful and hospitable. I appreciated the garlands and welcome drink.

The pool is just perfect and makes you feel like youâ€™ve escaped to a private villa, spent hours in it.

The breakfast however was by far the biggest highlight. A delicious mix of French, North Indian, South Indian, and other cuisines with a constantly revolving menu each day. The service is highly attentive, Nithya and Antony in particular were wonderful.

The only negative I could think of in the whole experience? Please use less starch in your napkins haha.

This hotel is hands down the best luxury stay in Pondicherry. The rooms are beautifully designed with great attention to detailâ€”those soft cotton bathrobes were a personal favorite!

The small swimming pool and elegant lobby add a charming touch to the ambiance.

Breakfast was unforgettableâ€”no buffet, just delicious made-to-order dishes that kept me happily full all morning.

A perfect blend of comfort, style, and scrumptious food!

Excellent place to spend time as it's extremely close to beach, hardly 100 meters. Food was great. Pool was very clean and clear. Place was neatly maintained with a charming ambience. Staff were very friendly but we had a not so great experience with one not well trained staff. Especially all the Staff at Front desk were extremely helpful, the Staff mam in reception was sweet enough to put Mehandi for my kid and also staff women at cafe at 2nd floor was greatly helpful, Abhijit was great. John at cafe was superbly friendly and helpful.

But sadly we felt one Staff member tall and with specs, serving food at 2nd floor Palais De Mahe cafeteria was bit rude. We had asked for one breakfast item if it could be packed for the kid and all we could here was a rude no, and a detailed explanation about what their Hotel is all about. We also felt he was particularly rude.

Someone need to train this Staff how to treat customers how to smile, how to say a polite no. These are basic hospitality etiquette.  We felt rather disappointed with your set menu, because today (Apr 28) we ordered 3 juice but the serving people never delivered it and forgot about it totally. So your set menu served with improperly trained Staff is a big let down for us as we did not stay at your hotel for free but paid for your services.

We stayed here for 3 nights and we couldn't fault anything, everything was amazing. The room was large, comfortable and extremely clean. The staff are lovely, very helpful and always friendly with excellent communication skills. The pool was excellent, the temperature of the water was great and the area was very well maintained. A welcome place to spend a bit afternoon after being out in the hot summer weather. The location is excellent being so close to the promenade for early morning and evening walks. We ate at the restaurant for breakfast and dinner and the food was delicious, exceptional food overall. I highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again without hesitation.

places.address: 5, Bussy St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.generalDescription: Serenity Beach in Pondicherry is a serene and tranquil spot that offers a sense of peace and calmness. It's a perfect place to unwind and enjoy the beauty of the coastline. Another must-visit is the Sri Karneshwar Nataraj Temple, designed in the style of an Egyptian pyramid, adding to its allure.
places.name: Serenity Beach

reviews.text: Visited Serenity Beach in the evening â€” the breeze and view were lovely, and itâ€™s a nice place to sit on the rocks, relax, and watch the sea. However, it was quite crowded and not very clean. The beach has more of a local, fisherman vibe with lots of boats and activity. Thereâ€™s a small area where you can play in the water, but overall itâ€™s better for a quick visit than a long beach day.

Serenity Beach in Pondicherry is a beautiful and peaceful escape.

The stone bridge adds to its charm, and you might find seashells. The waves are good for bathing, but be careful.

Weekdays are less crowded, making it perfect for photos and videos. Itâ€™s best to avoid visiting during the hottest part of the day.

Serenity Beach, located near Pondicherry (Puducherry), is a picturesque coastal destination. The beach features golden sands, gentle waves, and is less crowded compared to other beaches in the area, making it ideal for relaxation.

Surfing: The beach is popular among surfers due to its favorable wave conditions. Visitors can engage in surfing activities

Fishing: Serenity Beach is home to a vibrant fishing area. We can observe fishermen at work

The serene environment is perfect for leisurely walks along the shore and sunbathing.
Several cafes and eateries near the beach offer fresh seafood and local delicacies, providing a delightful culinary experience.

Serenity Beach for its cleanliness, peacefulThe less commercialized nature of the beach allows for a more authentic and relaxing experience

Visit:
The ideal time to visit Serenity Beach is between November and February when the weather is pleasant, making it suitable for beach activities and water sports

Accessiblity:
Serenity Beach is approximately 3 kilometers from Pondicherry city center, making it easily accessible by local transport or a short drive.

Serenity Beach offers stunning sunrise views, making it the perfect spot to start your day. The beach is also ideal for surfing, with expert instructors offering lessons for all levels. The relaxed atmosphere adds to the charm, making it a great destination for both beginners and seasoned surfers. Itâ€™s a beautiful mix of nature and adventure. Highly recommended for a peaceful yet thrilling experience!

True to its name, Serenity Beach is all about calm vibes, salty breeze, and soulful silence. Located just a short ride from the main town, it offers a more peaceful, less crowded alternative to Rock or Paradise Beach â€” perfect for early risers and quiet souls.

What to Expect:

Golden sands and rocky patches create a stunning, raw coastal backdrop.

A favorite among surfers, with small surf schools nearby.

Beautiful sunrises and long walks along the shore.

A few local cafÃ©s and stalls add charm without overwhelming the space.

Good to Know:

Best visited during early morning or golden hour for fewer crowds and softer light.

Great for photography, reflection, and nature lovers.

Final Thoughts:
If you're looking for a spot to sit, breathe, and watch the waves without distraction â€” Serenity Beach is your kind of place. Simple, soulful, and true to its name. ðŸŒŠâ˜€ï¸

places.address: XRFV+8W, Kottakuppam, Puducherry, Tamil Nadu 605101, India

places.generalDescription: Boutique du Kashmir is a charming little store in Pondicherry that offers a delightful assortment of skirts, pants, scarfs, shawls, bags, purses, dresses and carpets. The collection features unique designs and high-quality items. Visitors appreciate the accommodating shop owner who allows them to browse at their own pace. Additionally, the boutique offers reasonable prices compared to others in the area.
places.name: Boutique du Kashmir

reviews.text: Small shop but nice collection of skirts, pants, scarfs, shawls, bags, purses, dresses and carpets. Unique designs and great quality too. The shop owner is amazing and allows you to shop at your leisure. The price is reasonable compared to other boutiques in Pondicherry.

The shop owner is really good
He showed us around we brought a chain, a small toy and coasters. Felt a bit pricy but again it's reasonable. Cool collection but need a bit of renewing and getting new this generation stock in scarfs and clothes. Loved the shop owner is not pushy to buy things very understanding and speaks English

places.address: WRPM+P4H, H.M.Kassim Salai, Heritage Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Polished hotel in a 19th-century mansion offering dining, an outdoor pool & breakfast.
places.generalDescription: La Villa is a refined hotel housed in a 19th-century mansion, offering upscale dining, an outdoor pool, and breakfast services. Situated in Pondicherry, it provides a tranquil retreat amidst the lively town. Notably pet-friendly, the hotel warmly welcomes furry companions, ensuring a memorable experience for both guests and their pets. The property stands out with its personalized service and inclusive approach to pet accommodation.
places.name: La Villa

reviews.text: We went to La Villa, Pondicherry for lunch on a weekday, and the experience was nothing short of peaceful. With no crowd around, the whole place had a quiet, unhurried charm that felt incredibly calming. The outdoor seating was especially lovely â€” surrounded by trees and a soft breeze that made the meal feel even more relaxing. The food was quite enjoyable. The prawn starter stood out with its great flavour and texture, while the beef spaghetti was just okay. But the highlight was definitely the La Villa special dessert â€” it was too good, with so many textures and layers of flavour that we absolutely loved. Overall, it was a slow, soulful afternoon that felt like a breath of fresh air in every way.

An Unforgettable Stay at La Villa â€“ Exceptional Service & Exquisite Dining

Our stay at La Villa was nothing short of perfection. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with warmth and professionalism, with every member of staff demonstrating the highest standards of customer service. Their attention to detail and genuine hospitality made us feel truly special.

The highlight of our experience was the incredible seven-course taster menu. Each dish was a masterpiece, beautifully presented and bursting with flavour. The creativity and craftsmanship of the chefs were evident in every bite, making it an unforgettable dining experience.

There are too many names to mention who made this stay exceptional, because everyone who was on duty during our stay offered service above and beyond, from the reception staff, the staff who oversaw the restaurant to the kitchen and housekeeping staff however, a big shout out  to Anil, Masee Lupin and Daia They all really know how to make a stay really special.

To make our stay even more special, the team went above and beyond by decorating our room for my partnerâ€™s birthday celebration. The effort and thoughtfulness that went into the setup made the occasion even more magical, and we couldnâ€™t have asked for a better way to celebrate.

The theme continued the next morning with breakfast, we once again sat outside for a great breakfast, juice, great coffee, an assortment of fresh fruit with yogurt. Bread, croissants and pastries together with a hot option. What more could we need ! We loved it and to add to this, the service was excellent.

A huge thank you to everyone at La Villa for making our stay so memorable. A big shout out to Anil, Masee; Lupin and Daia. If youâ€™re looking for exceptional service, first-class dining, and a truly special experience, this is the place to be! We canâ€™t wait to return.
We had dinner there (not stayed at the hotel), and it was excellent. Delicious food, good quality price. And nice environment

From the moment we arrived, we realised that there was something different about La Villa, but nothing prepared us for how delightful our stay here would be.

Seldom do you find a group of like-minded individuals who not only understand hospitality but strive to exceed your expectations in everything that they do.

The premises are delightful, and I know that there are several classic french  styles in Puducherry.

What makes La Villa stand out is the people. The genuine warmth and caring attitude exuded by the team isn't manufactured. It is instinctive and always provided with the warmest of smiles.

A special mention to Dia and Masee in the restaurant. Viknesh, Vijay, and Kit in reception. And, all of those unseen who make everything work like a well-oiled machine.

The cleanliness of the rooms and the attention to detail of the housekeepers also should also be congratulated. The room flowers, complementary snacks, and minibar were refreshed daily, as were the towels and bed linen. With no details ever overlooked.

And, it doesn't end there...the food is absolutely outstanding and the breakast is literally a work of culinary art.

The a la carte meals are superb both in presentation and taste. And, any foodie would would be foolish to miss out on the tasting menu.

Thank you all, so much for making our stay as comfortable as it was memorable.

Sue and Paul

What a property and what amazing staff. Balaji is a rockstar with perfect suggestions and understanding of what people want. This was by far one of the best meals I had in Pondicherry. Do not miss!

Ps. Call a day in advance for the seven course tasting menu. You wonâ€™t regret it.

places.address: 11, Surcouf St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Strip of rocky shoreline in a populous urban area with a promenade, a war memorial & a park.
places.generalDescription: Promenade Beach is a popular rocky shoreline in an urban area, featuring a promenade, war memorial, and nearby park. It spans 1,500 meters and is a major attraction for both locals and tourists. The beach is located near several notable landmarks including the Mahatma Gandhi statue, Monsieur Dupleix statue, New pier, War memorials, and the Puducherry port.
places.name: Promenade Beach

reviews.text:
Promenade Beach in Puducherry is absolutely stunning! The long stretch of clean coastline, the sound of the waves, and the peaceful vibe make it perfect for morning walks or relaxing evenings. The sunrise here is breathtaking - a must-see if youâ€™re an early riser.

There are plenty of cafÃ©s, heritage buildings, and French colonial architecture nearby, which adds to the charm of the area. Itâ€™s well-maintained, and the no-vehicle zone along the beachfront makes it safe and enjoyable for families and tourists.

Highly recommended if youâ€™re visiting Puducherry - it captures the spirit of the town beautifully!

Visited Promenade Beach at night and absolutely loved the vibe. The cool breeze, sound of waves, and calm surroundings made it a perfect spot to unwind. The area was clean, well-lit, and felt safe even late in the evening. Plenty of people just walking or sitting quietly â€” really gives you a break from the usual city chaos. Great place for a relaxed stroll or just to clear your head. Definitely a must-visit if you're in Pondy!

A perfect blend of beauty and peace.

The Pondicherry beach is one of the most scenic spots in the city. Stretching along the Bay of Bengal, the walkway offers stunning views of the sea, especially during sunrise. I have been there many a times for the sunrise. The cool breeze, rhythmic sound of the waves, and clean surroundings make it the perfect place for quiet reflection.

Whether youâ€™re out for sightseeing, enjoying coffee by the sea, or simply sitting on the rocks soaking in the view, the beach has a charm that instantly puts you at ease. With landmarks like the Gandhi statue and French War Memorial nearby, it also offers a glimpse into Pondicherryâ€™s rich heritage.

P.S - first and last photo were taken some 8 years ago.

Promenade Beach is more of a chilling spot rather than walk in the sand kind of place. It has rocks across the shore and one can be seated there and enjoy the waves. It is recommended to be here for beautiful sunrise. However, the location is also apt for evening walks and enjoy the beautiful white buildings and serene cafÃ©s. We opted for the Le Cafe situated at the beach and loved the view and food both.

The Promenade beach is the main beach in Pondicherry, also called the Rock beach or the Pondicherry beach. The beach is rocky and you can't get to the sea directly, except at a few places. Very popular with locals and tourists both. Gets very crowded in the evening. A lot of sitting areas are made along the beach.

places.address: Puducherry, India

places.description: Stylish guesthouse in a 19th-century Colonial building, featuring a restaurant & a leafy terrace.
places.generalDescription: Villa Helena Heritage Guest House & Restaurant is a stylish guesthouse housed in a 19th-century Colonial building, offering accommodation with free WiFi and a garden. Located in the center of Puducherry, it provides an aesthetic experience with its cozy corners and visual appeal. The family-friendly restaurant serves French cuisine as well as Continental and Italian dishes. The property boasts 7 spacious and elegant rooms with colorful and minimalistic decor, making it an ideal place to stay.
places.name: Villa Helena Heritage Guest House & Restaurant

reviews.text:
The restaurant offers some commendable dishes â€” the pork and crÃ¨me caramel, in particular, were quite good and enjoyable. However, the dining experience was significantly let down by the poor service. The staff seemed inattentive and unresponsive while taking orders, and basic requests were either ignored or met with resistance. Moreover, there was a noticeable lack of warmth or courtesy â€” no smiles, and at times, even arguments with customers.

Great food can only go so far without good hospitality. I hope the management takes steps to improve the service, as it currently overshadows the quality of the food. This is not the first time to me here , which repeats so here i am with this review.

Ambience and vibe of the place is excellent, with a Good garden in the heritage property. It is supposedly a 100 plus years property.

Restaurant has a limited menu but the food served is good.

Best part is you can walk around to the best that white town has to offer.

Flooring of the room particularly where we stayed (B2) needs improvement.

Sudha and Geraldine are good hosts.

We did not stay, although it looked very nice as a heritage home, but had dinner in the courtyard. A varied albeit limited menu, the food was delicious and the service was excellent. Very good value for money and a relaxed vibe. Would definitely recommend

Not value for money â€¦. Rooms are badly ventilated and mostly damp. Limited menuâ€¦. Service is also ok type . Nothing can be taken to the room . Lots of improvement needed. Yes , the location is good and paid parking is available . Better and cheaper options like sea facing rooms are available .
The property gives a vibe of French era . Overall an OK type set up

Just 5 mins walk from beach, this is in a french style town. The rooms also give glimpse of french bungalow with high ceilings and windows.
The lady is very sweet and runs a small boutique as well. About food, its one of best you get in town. We have been 5 times to Pondicherry and styed here twice but rest time we make sure to visit restaurants in evening to enjoy the vibing spirits nd great food. Must visit

places.address: 13, Bussy St, White Town, Puducherry, Tamil Nadu 605001, India

places.generalDescription: Delhi Kitchen is a popular spot, especially on weekends, offering North Indian cuisine along with Chinese and Continental dishes. It's frequented by tourists and students from medical and engineering colleges in Pondicherry. The restaurant provides a mix of Punjabi and North Indian recipes. While some find it relatively expensive, many are pleased with the delicious food offered here. The ambience and service are generally praised, although some feel that certain dishes could be spicier.
places.name: Delhi Kitchen

reviews.text: Usually at weekends it's busy as a beehive, but other weekdays it's pretty quiet and serene. Food is mostly Delhi/north indian like it's name, food taste was also fine as well as the time for preparation.
On an average, a good hotel, medium class facilities. Tandoori chicken was good, but Pudina Tandoori chicken was not that good and not spicy at all.
Its a nice place to hang out especially for tourists n pondy medical n engg students who are looking for typical punjabi north indian recipies n also chinese n continental eatries.
Best if there is, in south goa you didn't good food as this does. Awesome service.
Good restaurant in puducherry all type of  north dish available here and all are north side cook actually its my mama restaurant.

places.address: No: 184, next to IDBI bank, Sardar Vallabhai Patel Salai, Puducherry, 605001, India

places.description: Laid-back quarters, some with balconies, in an unpretentious hotel featuring breakfast & Wi-Fi.
places.generalDescription: Located in Pondicherry, 19 Villa Mira offers free WiFi and a range of amenities including a restaurant and bar. The property is 400 metres from Sri Aurobindo Ashram and 300 metres from Sri Aurobindo Hand Made Paper Factory.
places.name: 19 Villa Mira

reviews.text: Excellent stay! Sweetest staff, good rooms, great location. Breakfast was homely and delicious..highly recommend.. one of the best places to stay in white town!

The best location, best manager, best staff. We are very grateful for their hospitality, behaviour. The manager sir helped us with scooty rent and auto ride at night and those men were also very very good. The homely in-house breakfast was also good along with helping mam and sirâ€™s behaviour. The deluxe room was a bit small but the heritage furniture was fantastic!! We had a lavish time here â™¥ï¸ Will recommend everyone ðŸ˜Š

The full experience coming soon on YouTube channel @thebongtravazies. Please subscribe ðŸ˜Š

Wonderful hotel!
Very friendly, polite staff, professionals in their field.
Spacious, luxurious rooms. The rooms have all the amenities: shower, toiletries, tea, electric kettle, air conditioning, fan.
The rooms are very clean.
Good breakfast, lots of fruits.
Convenient location, close to the sea and the center of Puducherry. Strong Wi-Fi.
Had a great time and rest. Thanks to the staff!

Sweet little stay at this modest, historical place. Very friendly hosts, comfortable beds, feels safe and secure. The furnishings are gorgeous. The bathroom could do with a little upgrade, but it was still very clean.

This place was a perfect "home " for us three girls for our weekend getaway. The room was so near and clean, yes small but that didn't matter coz it was well arranged. There wasn't a speck of dust and the sheets were clean only. The rooms had the perfect heritage touch and we really enjoyed our time.

Ofcourse safety was our priority and we felt very safe and secure and the place actually felt like a home.

The breakfast served was so good. And uma aunty made us omelette and coffee and it was so good and comforting. She was so nicee and not only her, all the people in the hotel were so nicee

places.address: 19, Lally Tollendal St, White Town, Puducherry, 605001, India
